architecturalDecisions: Initially, a single bounded context 'CheeseCatalog' is sufficient given the clear and focused application goal.
The 'CheeseType' entity will serve as the aggregate root for managing all related cheese information.

aggregates.description: Represents a distinct type of cheese from Boyaca, acting as the aggregate root.

attributes.characteristics: Flavor profile, texture, aging process, etc.
attributes.id: Unique identifier for the cheese type
attributes.imageUrl: URL to an image of the cheese
attributes.name: Name of the cheese type
attributes.origin: Specific origin within Boyaca (e.g., town, municipality)

aggregates.name: CheeseType

repositories.description: Provides mechanisms to retrieve and persist CheeseType aggregates.
repositories.name: CheeseTypeRepository

boundedContexts.description: Manages the data and logic related to different types of cheeses from Boyaca, including their details and search capabilities.

domainServices.description: Orchestrates the search for CheeseTypes within the CheeseCatalog bounded context.
domainServices.name: CheeseSearchService

boundedContexts.name: CheeseCatalog

ubiquitousLanguage.Boyaca: The region in Colombia known for these cheeses.
ubiquitousLanguage.CheeseType: A variety of cheese originating from Boyaca, with specific characteristics.
ubiquitousLanguage.Search: The action of finding cheese types based on criteria.
ubiquitousLanguage.User: The end-user interacting with the application.

SoftwareApplication.goal: The user can search in a web application what are the different types of Cheeses from Boyaca.
SoftwareApplication.name: El Suero Boyaco
